keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: Creamy Italian rice dish, with wild mushrooms and walnuts. You need to stand over the pan while it's cooking but just add a little salad and you've a complete meal.

method.text: In a large frying pan, saute the onion in the butter until just soft. Add the rice. Cook for 2-3 min, until well-coated with butter.
Gradually add some stock to the pan, stirring constantly. Add more stock as soon as it has been absorbed.
When the rice is creamy, add the turmeric and season. Continue to add stock until thick. The rice should be tender but not sticky. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Adjust the seasoning as required.

title: Wild mushroom risotto
